mapper.select: select * from itemboard ib, item i, store s where ib.item_no = i.item_no and ib.store_no = s.store_no and ib.item_no = 1
select spell_no from spell where ROWNUM=1 order by spell_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into delivery (delivery_no, delivery_name, delivery_ph, delivery_address, delivery_address2, delivery_contents, spell_no) values (delivery_seq.nextval, #{delivery_name},#{delivery_ph},#{delivery_address},#{delivery_address2}, #{delivery_contents},#{spell_no})
insert into spell (spell_no, spell_date, email, item_no) values (#{spell_no}, sysdate, #{email}, #{item_no})
insert into pay (pay_no, pay_date, pay_price, spell_no, use_point) values (pay_seq.nextval,sysdate, #{pay_price},#{spell_no},#{use_point})
mapper.select: select distinct Itb.Title ,St.Store_Name,It.Delivery_State,It.Item_No,Ite.Thum_Img,It.Price,Pa.Pay_Date from item it, Spell sp,Delivery de,Itemboard itb,Store st,Itemimg ite, pay pa where It.Item_No = Sp.Item_No and De.Spell_No = Sp.Spell_No and Itb.Item_No = It.Item_No and St.Store_No = Itb.Store_No and Ite.Itemboard_No = Itb.Itemboard_No and Pa.Spell_No = Sp.Spell_No order by It.Item_No
